features.title: Travel Tutoring
features.description: Our tutors accompany your team to training camps, competitions, and away games, ensuring continuous learning.

features.title: Flexible Scheduling
features.description: Training at 5 AM? Practice until 10 PM? We adapt our tutoring schedule to fit your athletic commitments.
benefits: Early morning and late evening options

features.title: School Partnership
features.description: Trusted relationships with schools allow our tutors to proctor exams and serve as official academic liaisons.

features.title: Specialized Focus
features.description: We understand the unique challenges student athletes face and tailor our approach accordingly.

features.title: All Subjects
features.description: From math and science to literature and foreign languages, we cover all academic areas.

features.title: Group & Individual
features.description: Whether you need one-on-one attention or group study sessions, we've got you covered.

detailed_services.title: Travel Tutoring
detailed_services.subtitle: Education That Goes Where You Go
detailed_services.description: Our tutors accompany your team on training camps, tournaments, and competitions. We set up mobile learning environments wherever you are, ensuring your education never takes a back seat to your sport.

pricing.includes: 8 hours of availability, materials, travel expenses within 50 miles
pricing.additional: Longer distances and overnight stays quoted separately

detailed_services.title: Exam Proctoring
detailed_services.subtitle: Never Miss an Important Test
detailed_services.description: Through our trusted partnerships with schools, our certified tutors can proctor official exams while you're away for competitions, ensuring you never miss important assessments.

pricing.includes: Exam setup, proctoring, secure transmission of results

detailed_services.title: Flexible Scheduling
detailed_services.subtitle: Tutoring on Your Timeline
detailed_services.description: Your training schedule is demanding and unpredictable. Our tutoring sessions adapt to your availability, whether that's early morning, late evening, or weekend sessions.

detailed_services.title: Academic Liaison
detailed_services.subtitle: Your Bridge to Academic Success
detailed_services.description: We serve as the bridge between you and your school's academic staff, ensuring seamless communication about your progress, assignments, and any accommodations needed.

detailed_services.title: Group Study Programs
detailed_services.subtitle: Team Learning for Team Success
detailed_services.description: Perfect for teams traveling together. We organize group study sessions that build both academic knowledge and team camaraderie while maximizing learning efficiency.
benefits: Cost savings compared to individual sessions

detailed_services.title: College Preparation
detailed_services.subtitle: Your Path to Academic and Athletic Excellence
detailed_services.description: Specialized programs for student athletes preparing for college admissions, including SAT/ACT prep, college essay writing, and scholarship application assistance.

success_rate.admission_rate: 95% of students admitted to target schools

guarantees: Grade improvement within 30 days or money back
